page.title: 02ENTERTAINMENT
page.content:
It was started in 1907 by{Alan Moxey}
. 78 years later it has grown from 7 members to 34 members .{Alan moxey } started it with a two pound Cornet .Now the band has 34 instruments . Altogether they have 12 different types of instruments . They practice at their Band Hut nr.Mark Moor Farm .All the members are part time .They keep their instruments at home to practice . People come to play in the band from a twenty mile radius. {James Moxey }the grandson of {Alan Moxey}conducts the band.He lives at Weston-Zoyland which is 22 miles away from Burtle.He has served in the band for 41 years. The band plays at about a hundred places a year.At least 50% of the places are annual.
